data.title: The Digital Afterlife of Grief on LinkedIn: Photorealistic Digital Twins Resurect the Dead for Entertainment
data.meta_description:
Photorealistic Digital Twins Resurect the Dead for Entertainment
Elvis, Edith Piaf, Maria Callas, and George Carlin are all making an AI comeback, and de-aging…
data.text:
In the Generative AI news round-up, it’s a win-win for the estates of some of Hollywood’s biggest 20th-century stars while the Digital Replica Act aims to prevent AI-generated replicas of artists without prior consent. There’s a new death tech company that has a hefty fee and Jackie Chan is the latest actor to be de-aged. The AI COPIED Act is here and video content platforms have issued label warnings. #generativeai #technology #artificialintelligence #Hollywood #film #deepfake #law #policy #artists #entertainment #news #AINews #creative #digital #copyright https://lnkd.in/e8Zww8hZ

Just a little bit of Gen AI for this. Looks like the same apps I use https://lnkd.in/eYH6MwTN #fatboyslim
